resources.string: Go to help page to see more

"Asset server is your use for download song and movie, not including patterns.
 You can host those file on other server. 
 Notice: server address must not include "http://" and back slash. 

 For using with iOS, you must change "HTTP Server Address" and "Proxy Server Address" to this device's IP, keep the port unchanged if you don't know what that means.
 Then use Safari to open the HTTP Server Address, follow the instruction.
 If you using hotspot tethering, for most Android device the default IP is 192.168.43.1"
